definition: to open and close (the mouth etc)
to open and close (the mouth etc)/friendly/compliant/Taiwan pr. [xi4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: ' said Fleur, her nostrils flaring. 'What do I care how 'e looks?
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉說，鼻孔翕動着，“我幹嘛在乎他長得怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Ralph's lips formed a word but no sound came.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾夫嘴脣在翕動，但沒有聲音出來。

sentences.english: He kept moving his lips but could not utter a word.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴脣翕動着，可已經說不出話來。

sentences.english: Its wings are weak in flight. Afraid to be unknown, All night it gleams alone.
sentences.chinese: 螢火輕飛翔，翅膀翕動忙，唯恐人不知，整夜閃微光。

sentences.english: The prisoner's swollen mouth widened in a grin;
sentences.chinese: 囚徒紅腫的嘴脣翕動了一下，露齒一笑。
